QuestData.Title: A Goldtusk Greeting
QuestData.Description:
Thanks to you, de Goldtusk Inn has never looked better!
We got food, we got beds, we got piles of dead Sandfury nearby. Dis is everything I ever dreamed it be!
<Rhan'ka looks out into the oasis.>
You hear dat? Sound like we got our first guest of de day!
Why don't you greet dis one? Show 'em all de great amenities ya built here!
QuestData.LogDescription: Greet the approaching guest and show them around the Goldtusk Inn.
